oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Greetings from Nashville, Tennessee, between 1935 and 1954
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Front of postcard sending Greetings from Nashville, and showing several buildings of note, with the Parthenon and Lake of Centennial Park pictured in the center panel. The other buildings depicted on the postcard are (from left to right) Andrew Jackson's Tomb at the Hermitage, Fort Nashborough, Sam Davis Monument, State Capitol, Tennessee Supreme Court, Furman Hall at Vanderbilt University, Tomb of President James Knox Polk, and the War Memorial Building. Forms part of the Nashville Room Postcard Collection. 1 postcard : col. ; 3.5 x 5.5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Architecture; Capital City; Popular Culture; Advertising postcards--Tennessee--Nashville; Postcards--Tennessee--Nashville; Buildings--Tennessee--Nashville; Architecture--Tennessee--Nashville; Architectural elements--Tennessee--Nashville
